public void load(java.lang.String rescatDir)

public java.lang.String getPasswordField(java.lang.String property,

Get password field value from the loaded password store.

Parameters:

defaultVal - default value in case property is not there.

store

public void store()
Write the credential store to file. Designed to be run within Jdev. release() must be called in a finally block to release resources obtained.

See Also:
release()

release

public void release()
Release all resources used by this class. Must be used in a java finally block to balance loads.

See Also:
load(java.lang.String)
